original_title: どうしようもない恋の唄
overview: After experiencing failure in business and his marriage, Mitsutoshi Yashiro (Shinsuke Kato) walks around looking for a place to die. He decides to stop at a red light district shop to have sex for one last time. He meets Hina (Rina Fujisaki) who changes his life. - AsianWiki
tagline: This was supposed to be the last sex of my life without love
title: A Helpless Love Song
